## PatchTasksFieldsEffect type

Update fields

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PatchTasksFieldsEffect = {
    type: 'fields';
    fieldTemplateId: string;
    fields: {
        text?: string | null;
        date?: string | null;
        recursion?: any | null;
        label?: {
            optionId?: string;
        };
        labels?: {
            add?: Array<{
                id: string;
            }>;
            remove?: Array<{
                id: string;
            }>;
        };
        linkedTasks?: {
            add?: Array<{
                id: string;
                index?: number;
            }>;
            remove?: Array<{
                id: string;
                index?: number;
            }>;
        };
    };
    userIds?: {
        add?: Array<string>;
        remove?: Array<string>;
    };
};
```
